meanings.definition: The organ in the body that pumps blood.
meanings.sent1: Our hearts beat to keep us alive.
meanings.sent2: Doctors listen to hearts with a stethoscope.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe my heart decided to skip a beat!
meanings.sent4: Her heart of gold shines through in everything she does.
meanings.sent5: The heart is a vital organ that we must take care of.

meanings.definition: The central or innermost part of something.
meanings.sent1: The heart of the matter is understanding each other.
meanings.sent2: In the heart of the forest, you can find peace.
meanings.sent3: The heart of the puzzle was missing, making it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The heart of the city buzzes with energy and life.
meanings.sent5: The heart of a story is what keeps us reading.

meanings.definition: A shape or symbol representing love or affection.
meanings.sent1: She drew hearts all over the Valentine's card.
meanings.sent2: The heart emoji is used to express love online.
meanings.sent3: He sent her a heart-shaped balloon to show his affection.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like a heart drawn in the sand, easily washed away.
meanings.sent5: The heart symbol is universally recognized as a sign of love.

meanings.definition: The suit in a deck of cards with a red heart symbol.
meanings.sent1: I always try to collect hearts when playing cards.
meanings.sent2: The queen of hearts is a powerful card in the deck.
meanings.sent3: Hearts are my lucky suit in card games.
meanings.sent4: She held the ace of hearts, securing her victory.
meanings.sent5: The heart suit is associated with love and luck in games.
